vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νηρ-εύς, έως,
Ionic dialect ῆος, ὁ, Nereus, [Refs 8th c.BC+]
__2 sea, Λίβυς, Ἄραψ N., [Refs 4th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.15
§ Nereus, (Proper name), Rom. 16:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼利亞 这个陽性專有名詞在3491的字的意思是 "塊狀"
一個保羅問候的羅馬基督徒 (羅 16:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼利亚 这个阳性专有名词在3491的字的意思是 "块状"
一个保罗问候的罗马基督徒 (罗 16:15)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Nê-rê: « Một thần biển cai trị Địa-trung-hải ». Xem G3491.
